languages.text:
"Нет для проклятого Волка иного пути,
Кроме как кару нести погубителям братьев,
Щедро огни их сердец тушит смерть,
Я же, остывший навеки, всегда выживаю".

"'For the cursed Wolf,
there is no other path
but to be the hand
that punishment metes out
to his brothers' slayers,
The fires of their hearts by death
are generously doused,
but I, cooled forever, always endure.'
languages.original_text:
"Нет для проклятого Волка иного пути,
Кроме как кару нести погубителям братьев,

languages.text:
”呪われた狼には
他の道はない
兄弟たちを殺した者に
罰を与える
手となるしかない
死によって彼らの心の炎は
余すことなく鎮火される
しかし、永遠に冷たい俺は、この先も耐え忍ぶ”
languages.original_text:
"'For the cursed Wolf,
there is no other path
but to be the hand
that punishment metes out
to his brothers' slayers,
The fires of their hearts by death
are generously doused,
but I, cooled forever, always endure.'

languages.text:
“‘对于被诅咒的孤狼，
他只能成为，
一只惩罚的铁手，
处决夺走兄弟性命的凶手，
除此之外再无他法。
他们心中的火焰，
已被死亡熄灭，
而我将永远沉静地忍受孤独。’”
languages.original_text:
"'For the cursed Wolf,
there is no other path
but to be the hand
that punishment metes out
to his brothers' slayers,
The fires of their hearts by death
are generously doused,
but I, cooled forever, always endure.'

而我将永远沉静地忍受孤独。”

languages.text:
« Pour le loup maudit,
nulle autre voie possible
que se faire le bras vengeur
pour châtier impitoyablement
les meurtriers de ses frères.
Leurs cœurs par la mort
ont été apaisés,
mais il me faut désormais
supporter seul leur perte. »
languages.original_text:
"'For the cursed Wolf,
there is no other path
but to be the hand
that punishment metes out
to his brothers' slayers,
The fires of their hearts by death
are generously doused,
but I, cooled forever, always endure.'

les meurtriers de ses frères.
Leurs cœurs par la mort
ont été apaisés,
mais il me faut désormais
supporter seul leur perte. »

languages.text:
«"Para el Lobo maldito
no hay otro camino
que convertirse en la mano
que inflige el castigo
a los asesinos de sus hermanos.
La muerte las llamas de sus corazones
ha apagado con cariño,
pero yo, siempre frío, nunca sucumbo".
languages.original_text:
"'For the cursed Wolf,
there is no other path
but to be the hand
that punishment metes out
to his brothers' slayers,
The fires of their hearts by death
are generously doused,
but I, cooled forever, always endure.'

a los asesinos de sus hermanos.
La muerte las llamas de sus corazones
ha apagado con cariño,
pero yo, siempre frío, nunca sucumbo".

languages.text:
"'Für den verfluchten Wolf
gibt es keinen anderen Pfad
als die Hand zu sein,
die den Mördern seiner Brüder
die gerechte Strafe zukommen lässt.
Die Feuer ihrer Herzen durch den Tod
werden großzügig gelöscht,
doch ich, für immer abgekühlt, überdauere immer.'
languages.original_text:
"'For the cursed Wolf,
there is no other path
but to be the hand
that punishment metes out
to his brothers' slayers,
The fires of their hearts by death
are generously doused,
but I, cooled forever, always endure.'

languages.text:
'Lanetli Kurt'un,
Kardeşlerini katledenlere
Cezalarını veren
El olmaktan
Başka yol yok.
Kalplerindeki ateş ölümle
Cömertçe ıslatıldı.
Ebediyen soğumuş bense dayanmalıyım.'
languages.original_text:
"'For the cursed Wolf,
there is no other path
but to be the hand
that punishment metes out
to his brothers' slayers,
The fires of their hearts by death
are generously doused,
but I, cooled forever, always endure.'

traits.locale_text:
'Lanetli Kurt için
kardeşlerini katledenlere
cezalarını veren
el olmaktan
başka bir yol yok.
Kalplerindeki ateş ölümle
cömertçe ıslatıldı.
Fakat ebediyen soğumuş olan ben, dayanmalıyım.'
